text:
It would be very useful for me if the function `create_simulation_data` could be moved from the example `plot_simulated_data.py` into nisl/datasets so that it can be imported from external projects.

I am willing to submit a patch if people are OK with this. Comments?
title: move create_simulation_data to nisl

text:
I am hesitating. This simulation data code is really not that great, and I wouldn't want people to start relying on it.

In other words, I think that in the not-to-distant future, the simulation code will undergo massive changes, and I don't want people complaining that we have broken their code with such changes.
